Mustafa Selcuk EKSIOGLU
PERSONAL DETAILS
LOCATION
Istanbul
QUALIFICATIONS
MBA in International Management, Baldwin-Wallace College, Berea, Ohio, USA
BS, Mechanical Engineering, Middle East Technical University, Ankara, Turkey
CAREER SUMMARY
TURK HENKEL KIM. SAN. Ve TIC. A.Ş., Istanbul, Turkey
Regional Business Development Manager (Jan. 2020 -current)
East Europe, India, Middle East, Africa Region,
Global Segment Manager
Responsible for analyzing, determining regional market potential, needs and business opportunities, creating market entry strategy, product portfolios accordingly, developing the business and boosting sales on regional level for Henkel’s Automotive Aftermarket business. Having the same responsibility in global level (6 regions of Henkel global) for one of the sub-segments of Automotive Aftermarket business.
TURK HENKEL KIM. SAN. Ve TIC. A.Ş., Istanbul, Turkey
Regional Business Development Manager (Sept. 2016 -Jan. 2020)
India, Middle East, Africa Region,
Global Segment Manager
Responsible for analyzing, determining regional market potential, needs and business opportunities, creating market entry
strategy, product portfolios accordingly, developing the business and boosting sales on regional level for Henkel’s
Automotive Aftermarket business.
Having the same responsibility in global level (6 regions of Henkel global) for one of the sub-segments of Automotive
Aftermarket business.
Regional Sales Manager & Business Development Manager, Henkel (July 2012 – Sept. 2016 )
India, Middle East, Africa (IMEA) Region
In addition to Automotive Aftermarket Business Development Manager position, Head of Sales of the new division of Henkel, Exterior Finish/ Car Detailing, in whole IMEA region. Establishing new business organization with salesteam and distribution network in the IMEA countries including Turkey. Accomplishments: Created completely new product range for Henkel’s new business segment. Brought substantial contribution to the growth of the division in the region. Also, made the new portfolio available in global Henkel regions.
SBU Manager Automotive Aftermarket Turkey, Turk Henkel A.S. (Jan. 2003- July 2012)
Regional Business Development Manager, Middle East & Africa
Had double function in the organization. Managed sales and marketing activities of Automotive Aftermarket SBU in
Turkey. Managed 6 regional sales managers , 7 sales engineers, 1 key account manager in 6 regions in Turkey.
In addition, responsible for developing Automotive Aftermarket business in the region MEA (Turkey, Central Asia, Iran,
Middle East, Continent Africa). Cooperating with 5 country managers. Reporting to regional SBU manager.
Accomplishments: Grew the sales in the MEA region by 300%. Enlarged dedicated Automotive salesteam to 14 territory sales managers and sales engineers in Turkey.
Established OES (Original Equipment Supplier) business model for sales of chemical consumables to the aftermarket divisions of the OEMs in Turkey.
As MEA business development manager, started to establish dedicated automotive salesforce in the region. Launched Henkel’s European market and product initiatives in the region.
Sales Manager General Industry and Aftermarket, Turk Henkel A.S. (Jan. 2000-Jan. 2003)
Responsible for managing sales and marketing activities of Engineering Adhesives SBU, which consists of Automotive Aftermarket and Industrial Maintenance, Repair & OEM. Managed salesteam of 13 sales engineers.
Accomplishments:
Differentiated the distributors and the salesteams of two divisions as Automotive and Industry. Revised the distribution
network of both divisions. Created specific focus in the market and increased the revenue of the SBU by an average of 200% in 3 years. Established territory sales management system.
Sales Manager Automotive Aftermarket, Loctite A.S. (Sept. 1997-Jan. 2000)
Responsible for managing the Automotive Aftermarket SBU of Henkel after the acqusition of Loctite Corporation. Managed salesteam of 5 sales engineers.
Accomplishments:
Merged aftermarket businesses and distribution networks of Henkel and Loctite companies. Also revised distribution
network. Brought new approach to the market. Combined

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
